text: Agyphantes is a genus of Asian dwarf spiders that was first described by Michael I. Saaristo & Y. M. Marusik in 2004. it contains only two species: A. sajanensis and A. sakhalinensis. ==See also== * List of Linyphiidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Linyphiidae Category:Spiders of Russia Category:Taxa named by Michael Saaristo
title: Agyphantes
